whole block is made with single crochet it s perfect practice for holding your hook and yarn learning gauge and getting nice straight row starting chain 17 work all row in single_crochet until your block is a cute little square if you can chain and single_crochet you can make this block pattern block 1 single_crochet starting chain 17 terms us crochet terms abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet st s stitch es notes turning chains do not count as a stitch use your larger crochet hook for this pattern block instructions 1 foundation chain chain 17 2 row 1 setup row single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across turn you should have 16 single_crochet 3 row 2 single_crochet row chain 1 single_crochet in first st and in each st across turn 4 repeat repeat row 2 single_crochet across turn until your block is roughly square end after a row 2 5 finish fasten_off and weave tails pg 6 www hodgepodge-crochet com day 2 half_double_crochet block welcome to day 2 of our 12 stitches of christmas block bag cal today we re moving up from single_crochet to half_double_crochet half_double_crochet this stitch is a little taller and works up faster but it s still super simple and great for beginners starting chain 17 row 1 single_crochet across all other row half_double_crochet with chain 2 when you turn keep going in half_double_crochet row until your block looks like a cute little square pattern block 2 half_double_crochet starting chain 17 terms us crochet terms abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet
